game.name: KUNAI
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 악몽 같은 사건이 세상을 뒤흔들었다. 사악한 레몬쿠스에 의해 인류는 전멸 직전까지 내몰렸다. 로봇들이 지상을 자유롭게 활보하고 있다. 플레이어는 고대 전사의 혼이 봉인된 살인 로봇 Tabby가 된다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: KUNAI is a quirky, fast-paced action platformer. You play as Tabby, a tablet who joins the fight against a robot uprising. Use your kunai and ninja parkour skills to stop Lemonkus, the A.I.-gone-evil that almost wiped out all human life.

reviewHighlights.text: KUNAI, developed by TurtleBlaze and published by The Arcade Crew and Gamirror Games, is a fast-paced 2D action platformer that fuses the acrobatics of...
game, good. Protect game, become game(reference to in-game diologe)
